subject: [LH] re: Kate might tour . . .
body:
>> WHAT!!!!!???!!!!!
 >>
 >> Kate might tour?!!!!
 >>
 >> I would sell both kidneys to see that! [...]

 > Oh, to be young again!

I. knows just what you mean: he's now 49 years old; at this point in his life he's sensible enough to consider only one kidney. 

-- IED
    SSI
